about_the_game:
Mangrove Dynamics welcomes you to Evercrest. It is the largest and most powerful oil rig in the North Atlantic. Well, it was the most powerful when it was still operating. Now it's your job to restore it to that state.

Fluid system is a complex network governed by five parameters, each influencing the appearance and behavior of the fluids coursing through the pipes. You must contend with shifting fluid dynamics, encountering eerie phenomena. Successfully managing these parameters becomes crucial for survival, as the fluid system itself becomes a malevolent force, adding layers of horror to the player's desperate struggle to escape the rig's clutches.

The hallucination system manifests as a malevolent force, seeking to torment the player and disrupt their survival efforts. As you grapple with these hallucinations, distinguishing between what is real and what is not becomes increasingly challenging, intensifying the psychological horror of your ordeal on the isolated rig!

Tasked with repairing faults and maintaining the platform's functionality, you must navigate the treacherous terrain while constantly assessing the imminent dangers lurking within its confines. Every creaking pipe and flickering light serves as a reminder of the perilous nature of their mission, intensifying the suspense and challenge of surviving on the rig.

KEY FEATURES

  • A unique and exceptional fluid system, which is the core of gameplay and gives you a chance to survive.
  • Fighting uncharacteristic hallucinations that affect your mental health.
  • Endless struggle with problems and failures of the oil rig in the middle of the ocean.
  • Follow the old manual book on the computer, used to operate the entire oil rig.

name: Whispers of The Abyss

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2300 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 (2 GB VRAM) or AMD Radeon HD 7870, (2 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3770 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti (4GB VRAM) or AMD Radeon RX 560 with (4GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: Whispers of The Abyss is a horror game set on an old, abandoned oil rig owned by a ruthless corporation, Mangrove Dynamics. Your task is to survive. Just survive. And remember one thing: machines and fluid are your best allies.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish
